verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> be an <S%G652>apostle,<s%> set <S%G873>apart<s%> for the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
<S%G3739>which<s%> he promised <S%G4279>before<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%>

<S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G1096>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%>

who was <S%G3724>declared<s%> to be the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G42>holiness,<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> Jesus Christ our Lord,

<S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G651>apostleship,<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations,<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>'s sake;
<S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> to belong to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

to <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4516>Rome,<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> to be <S%G40>saints:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G4412>First,<s%> I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G2605>proclaimed<s%> <S%G1722>throughout<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3144>witness,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3000>serve<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> <S%G89>unceasingly<s%> I <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of you always in my <S%G5216>prayers,<s%>

<S%G1189>requesting,<s%> if by any <S%G1513>means<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> at <S%G4218>last<s%> I may be <S%G2137>prospered<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G1971>long<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G3330>impart<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5486>gift,<s%> to the <S%G1519>end<s%> that <S%G5209>you<s%> may be <S%G4741>established;<s%>

<S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> that I <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> may be <S%G4837>encouraged<s%> in <S%G1223>you,<s%> each of us by the <S%G240>other<s%>'s <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G5216>yours<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1700>mine.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G50>have<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G80>unaware,<s%> brothers, <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G4388>planned<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G2967>hindered<s%> so <S%G1204>far,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3781>debtor<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> to <S%G915>foreigners,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to the <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> to the <S%G453>foolish.<s%>

<S%G3779>So,<s%> as much <S%G3779>as<s%> <S%G2596>is<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G1691>me,<s%> I am eager to preach the Good <S%G2097>News<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> who <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4516>Rome.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G1870>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> for <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4100>believes;<s%> for the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> for the <S%G1672>Greek.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G601>is<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%> <S%G2531>As<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "But the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>"

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2722>suppress<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%>

<S%G1360>because<s%> that which is <S%G1110>known<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5318>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5318>revealed<s%> it to <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the invisible <S%G517>things<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2937>creation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> are clearly <S%G2529>seen,<s%> being <S%G3539>perceived<s%> through the things that are <S%G4161>made,<s%> <S%G5037>even<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G126>everlasting<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2305>divinity;<s%> <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> may <S%G1511>be<s%> without <S%G379>excuse.<s%>

<S%G1360>Because,<s%> <S%G1097>knowing<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> they <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> him <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2228>neither<s%> gave <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> became <S%G3154>vain<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1261>reasoning,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G801>senseless<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> was <S%G4654>darkened.<s%>
Professing <S%G5335>themselves<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4680>wise,<s%> they became <S%G3471>fools,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G236>traded<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G862>incorruptible<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> the likeness of an <S%G1504>image<s%> <S%G3667>of<s%> <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4071>birds,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5074>four-footed<s%> animals, <S%G2532>and<s%> creeping <S%G2062>things.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness,<s%> that <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> should be <S%G818>dishonored<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%>

<S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3337>exchanged<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> a <S%G5579>lie,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4573>worshiped<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3000>served<s%> the <S%G2937>creature<s%> rather <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G2936>Creator,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2128>blessed<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G1223>For<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G819>vile<s%> <S%G3806>passions.<s%> <S%G1063%G99999>For<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2338>women<s%> <S%G3337>changed<s%> the <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>function<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G3844>against<s%> <S%G5449>nature.<s%>

<S%G5037><s%> <S%G3668>Likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G730>men,<s%> <S%G863>leaving<s%> the <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>function<s%> of the <S%G2338>woman,<s%> <S%G1572>burned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3715>lust<s%> toward one <S%G1519>another,<s%> <S%G240><s%> <S%G730>men<s%> <S%G2716>doing<s%> what is <S%G808>inappropriate<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G730>men,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G618>receiving<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G3739>the<s%> <S%G1163>due<s%> <S%G489>penalty<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4106>error.<s%>

<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G1381>they<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1381>refused<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> their <S%G1922>knowledge,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a <S%G96>reprobate<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> those <S%G3588>things<s%> which <S%G2520>are<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2520>fitting;<s%>

being filled <S%G4137>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%> sexual <S%G4202>immorality,<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness,<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness,<s%> <S%G2549>malice;<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G5355>envy,<s%> <S%G5408>murder,<s%> <S%G2054>strife,<s%> <S%G1388>deceit,<s%> evil <S%G2550>habits,<s%> secret <S%G5588>slanderers,<s%>

<S%G2637>backbiters,<s%> hateful to <S%G2319>God,<s%> <S%G5197>insolent,<s%> <S%G5244>haughty,<s%> <S%G213>boastful,<s%> <S%G2182>inventors<s%> of evil <S%G2556>things,<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents,<s%>
without <S%G801>understanding,<s%> covenant <S%G802>breakers,<s%> without natural <S%G794>affection,<s%> <S%G786>unforgiving,<s%> <S%G415>unmerciful;<s%>

<S%G3748>who,<s%> <S%G1921>knowing<s%> the <S%G1345>ordinance<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4238>practice<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4909>approve<s%> of those <S%G3588>who<s%> practice <S%G4238>them.<s%>
